N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-2.7 - Determination of tentative equalization rate or ratio

State Regulations
(a) The percentage computed pursuant to
section
8186-2.3
of this Subpart shall be determined as the tentative equalization rate or ratio
for the current roll by ORPTS. (b) A Notice of Determination of Tentative Equalization Rate, or Ratio, shall be
mailed to the chief executive officer and to the assessor of the municipality
to which the current roll pertains. Such notice shall include: (1)
a statement that the tentative rate or
ratio has been determined; (2)
the
tentative equalization rate or ratio; (3)
an identification of the assessment roll
for which the rate or ratio was established; and
(4)
the time and place that a hearing will be
held to hear any complaint concerning such rate or ratio. (c) Such notice shall be mailed at least 25
days before the date specified for the hearing. Notes
